data.text: @Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews You don't know me, don't honey me. Show the respect you want others to give their fellow man. You presented crap as fact like it was researched, AND you have no goals in having the news change their JOBS other than to save your sensibilities.

@Cholie43 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews 💗Honey my position is that I would love to see the media stop splashing it around so no copycats do it. You be safe and I wish You well💗

@Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Aannddd you continue to not even answer questions about things YOU brought up. Stop trying to pass off your opinion as fact if you are unwilling to support your position.
@Cholie43 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews 💗what can we do then?💗How do we help?

@Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews So you want the news to stop informing the public? And that we should hide things because they make some people sad??? How is that helpful? What is the point?

@Cholie43 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews 💗why on earth wouldn’t you try if it might even slightly stop another horrible shooting of kids💗The data is that nothing is being done . I say give it a try , Sandy Hook was the worst. So freakin sad.😭

@Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews That doesn't answer my question. Can you provide data an how not showing society evils equates to less of it happening? That's like saying racism didn't exists 5 years ago like it does today, because the news showed it less.
@TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Way too close to home. So wrong.

@Cholie43 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews 💗I think it could help if they were not on the news media, why not give it a try , nothing else has worked , imagine if it saved children’s lives💗
@Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews And incidents of OD deaths have dropped where??

@Cholie43 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews I don’t think I’m gonna win this one but I gotta stick to what I truly believe and that’s ...If the media would not broadcast all the shootings than it would cut down on the shootings 💗They do it with the death of overdoses .💗
@therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Please read my reply 💗💗💗
@TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews So true. Another sad day in America.
@therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Read the reply please I felt completely sick when I saw the news.💗
@Kimberl14853040 @therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Ummm, did you just ask why the news reports the news?

@therealcarrie18 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews I know Iknow my Dear. I’m Pissed Off, My intent was to finally ask why the powerful news Media is Not helping to stop the shootings instead of just reporting them. I truly believe it creates copycat shootings. Please forgive me💗

@Kimberl14853040 @TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Really? Who cares about anyone's local news when people ACROSS THE COUNTRY might have family members affected by this. That's the point of a Special Report. That's why it's called BREAKING NEWS
@TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Seriously Today, Your big and powerful what can you do to help stop the shootings?
@TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Just another case of mental illness, perscribe a couple of prayers and thoughts to the families because there's nothing we can do about it.

@TODAYshow @SavannahGuthrie @hodakotb @NBCNews Who told you to start reporting so early, we already were aware of it and if we weren’t we would have found out at 7. You took over my local news. What can you do to help stop shooters the reports aren’t helping .I know your uncomfortable.
